objects.text:
• 16.3MP APS-C X-Trans Sensor
• Advanced Autofocus System
• Classic Retro-Styled Design
• Built-in Wi-Fi Connectivity

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled design with premium build quality and ergonomic handling
• Advanced 16.3MP APS-C X-Trans CMOS II Sensor for exceptional image quality
• High-performance autofocus system with 77 AF points for precise focusing
• Built-in electronic viewfinder (EVF) with 2.36M-dot resolution
• Versatile 3-inch tilting LCD screen for creative shooting angles
• Film Simulation modes to recreate classic Fujifilm looks
• Full HD 1080p video recording capability at 60fps
• Built-in Wi-Fi connectivity for easy image sharing and remote control
• Compatible with Fujifilm's extensive X-mount lens system
• Compact and lightweight design perfect for travel photography
• Multiple manual control dials for quick access to essential settings
• Up to 8 FPS continuous shooting for action photography

banner_details:
This bold and modern banner showcases a professional camera product in a high-contrast black aesthetic. The composition divides the canvas diagonally, featuring the product image on the right and content on a dark overlay to the left. The banner includes a large, white uppercase headline ("heading") that grabs attention, followed by a bold subheading ("subheading") and italicized offer text ("tagline"). A bullet-point feature list ("description") highlights the product’s capabilities. A clear call-to-action button ("cta" & "cta_background") underlines customer urgency, complemented by a strong pricing element ("price") and a label ("subheading_2"). This layout emphasizes clarity, contrast, and sleek, professional appeal.

**Color Palette:**
- Jet Black: #111111  
- Pure Black: #000000  
- Soft White: #f5f5f5  
- Semi-Transparent White: #ffffffb3  
- Subtle Gray (overlay shapes): #707072 (10% opacity)
product_color: The product image of the Fujifilm X-T10 showcases a sleek and professional aesthetic. Predominantly black (#1A1A1A), the camera exudes sophistication with matte finishes that contrast subtly with gloss-black highlights (#2E2E2E) on the lens and dials. Silver metallic accents (#C0C0C0) on the buttons and text labels add refinement and clarity, enhancing usability while giving a premium look. Minimal red (#C40000) and orange (#FF6F00) accents on the lens scale offer visual interest and guide the viewer’s eye. The lens glass reflects teal (#66D3C2) and yellow-green (#C7D849) hues, adding depth. An ideal color palette for an ad would include black, silver, teal, red, and orange.
